headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Ecolab (ECL) After Strong Multi‑Year Share Price Gains?
summary: For investors wondering if Ecolab at around US$271 a share is still a sensible entry point, or if the price already reflects everything good about the business, this article walks through what the numbers are saying about value. The stock has logged returns of 2.7% over the last 7 days, 4.6% over 30 days, 3.4% year to date, 18.5% over 1 year, 84.2% over 3 years and 28.5% over 5 years, which naturally raises questions about what you are paying for today. Recent coverage around Ecolab has...
